Quick Reference

Core Classes:

  • amber.Model - Base class for all agent-based models

  • amber.Agent - Individual agent with behaviors and properties

  • amber.BaseAgent - Abstract base class for custom agents

  • amber.BaseModel - Abstract base class for custom models

Environments:

  • amber.GridEnvironment - 2D grid-based spatial environment

  • amber.SpaceEnvironment - Continuous 2D space environment

  • amber.NetworkEnvironment - Graph/network-based environment

Data Structures:

  • amber.AgentList - List-like container for agents with additional functionality

Optimization:

  • amber.grid_search() - Exhaustive parameter space search

  • amber.random_search() - Random parameter sampling

  • amber.bayesian_optimization() - Bayesian optimization of model parameters

Experiments:

  • amber.Experiment - Framework for running multiple model configurations

  • amber.Sample - Parameter sampling for experiments

  • amber.IntRange - Integer range specification for parameters
